paper_abstract: We designed constructed a 24x24-port optical circuit switch (OCS) prototype with a programming time of 68.5 mu s, a switching time of 2.8 mu s, and a receiver electronics initialization time of 8.7 mu s [1]. We demonstrate the operation of this prototype switch in a data center testbed under various workloads.
paper_title: A Demonstration of Ultra-Low-Latency Data Center Optical Circuit Switching
